subject: Snowboarding
Traumatic Brain Injury
lead_paragraph: Kevin Pearce suffered severe head trauma during a halfpipe training run before the Olympic Games. Tom Brokaw spent some time with the Pearce and his family in Vermont. (Video: MSNBC)
snippet: Kevin Pearce suffered severe head trauma during a halfpipe training run before the Olympic Games. Tom Brokaw spent some time with the Pearce and his family in Vermont. (Video: MSNBC)
